verses.verse: אֵלֶּה֩ <WH428> 'el-Leh These דִבְרֵ֨י <WH1697> div-Rei These [are] the words הַבְּרִ֜ית <WH1285> hab-be-Rit of the covenant אֲ‍ ֽשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'asher- which צִוָּ֧ה <WH6680> tziv-Vah commanded יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh which the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- מֹשֶׁ֗ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh, Moses לִכְרֹ֛ת <WH3772> lich-Rot to make אֶת־ <WH854> 'et- with בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> be-Nei with the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> be-'E-retz in the land מוֹאָ֑ב <WH4124> mo-'Av; of Moab מִלְּבַ֣ד <WH905> mil-le-Vad alone הַבְּרִ֔ית <WH1285> hab-be-Rit, beside the covenant אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- which כָּרַ֥ת <WH3772> ka-Rat which he made אִתָּ֖ם <WH854> 'it-Tam at בְּחֹרֵֽב׃ <WH2722> be-cho-Rev. with them in Horeb פ Peh

וַיִּקְרָ֥א <WH7121> vai-yik-Ra called מֹשֶׁ֛ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh And Moses אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- about כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El unto all Israel וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer and said אֲלֵהֶ֑ם <WH413> 'a-le-Hem; about אַתֶּ֣ם <WH859> 'at-Tem You רְאִיתֶ֗ם <WH7200> re-'i-Tem, unto them Ye have seen אֵ֣ת <WH853> 'et כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all אֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> 'a-Sher after עָשָׂ֨ה <WH6213> 'a-Sah did יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> Yah-weh all that the LORD לְעֵֽינֵיכֶם֙ <WH5869> le-'ei-nei-Chem before your eyes בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> be-'E-retz in the land מִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> mitz-Ra-yim, of Egypt לְפַרְעֹ֥ה <WH6547> le-far-'Oh unto Pharaoh וּלְכָל־ <WH3605> u-le-chol- and all עֲבָדָ֖יו <WH5650> 'a-va-Dav and unto all his servants וּלְכָל־ <WH3605> u-le-chol- and all אַרְצֽוֹ׃ <WH776> ar-Tzo. and unto all his land

הַמַּסּוֹת֙ <WH4531> ham-mas-sOt temptations הַגְּדֹלֹ֔ת <WH1419> hag-ge-do-Lot, The great אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which רָא֖וּ <WH7200> ra-'U have seen עֵינֶ֑יךָ <WH5869> 'ei-Nei-cha; which thine eyes הָאֹתֹ֧ת <WH226> ha-'o-Tot the signs וְהַמֹּפְתִ֛ים <WH4159> ve-ham-mo-fe-Tim miracles הַגְּדֹלִ֖ים <WH1419> hag-ge-do-Lim and those great הָהֵֽם׃ <WH1992> ha-Hem. those

וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> ve-lo- nor נָתַן֩ <WH5414> na-Tan hath not given יְהוָ֨ה <WH3068> Yah-weh Yet the LORD לָכֶ֥ם la-Chem לֵב֙ <WH3820> lev you an heart לָדַ֔עַת <WH3045> la-Da-'at, to perceive וְעֵינַ֥יִם <WH5869> ve-'ei-Na-yim and eyes לִרְא֖וֹת <WH7200> lir-'ot to see וְאָזְנַ֣יִם <WH241> ve-'a-ze-Na-yim and ears לִשְׁמֹ֑עַ <WH8085> lish-Mo-a'; to hear עַ֖ד <WH5704> 'ad against הַיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> hai-Yom unto this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> haz-Zeh. to this

וָאוֹלֵ֥ךְ <WH1980> va-'o-Lech have led אֶתְכֶ֛ם <WH853> 'et-Chem אַרְבָּעִ֥ים <WH705> 'ar-ba-'Im you forty שָׁנָ֖ה <WH8141> sha-Nah years בַּמִּדְבָּ֑ר <WH4057> bam-mid-Bar; in the wilderness לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- have not בָל֤וּ <WH1086> va-Lu are not waxen old שַׂלְמֹֽתֵיכֶם֙ <WH8008> sal-mo-tei-Chem your clothes מֵעֲלֵיכֶ֔ם <WH5921> me-'a-lei-Chem, on וְנַֽעַלְךָ֥ <WH5275> ve-na-'al-Cha upon you and thy shoe לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- has not בָלְתָ֖ה <WH1086> val-Tah is not waxen old מֵעַ֥ל <WH5921> me-'Al on רַגְלֶֽךָ׃ <WH7272> rag-Le-cha. upon thy foot

לֶ֚חֶם <WH3899> Le-chem bread לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo nor אֲכַלְתֶּ֔ם <WH398> 'a-chal-Tem, Ye have not eaten וְיַ֥יִן <WH3196> ve-Ya-yin wine וְשֵׁכָ֖ר <WH7941> ve-she-Char or strong drink לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo nor שְׁתִיתֶ֑ם <WH8354> she-ti-Tem; neither have ye drunk לְמַ֙עַן֙ <WH4616> le-Ma-'an order תֵּֽדְע֔וּ <WH3045> te-de-'U, that ye might know כִּ֛י <WH3588> ki that אֲנִ֥י <WH589> 'a-Ni I am יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh that I [am] the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH430> 'e-lo-hei-Chem. your God

וַתָּבֹ֖אוּ <WH935> vat-ta-Vo-'u And when ye came אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- about הַמָּק֣וֹם <WH4725> ham-ma-Kom unto this place הַזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> haz-Zeh; this וַיֵּצֵ֣א <WH3318> vai-ye-Tze came out סִיחֹ֣ן <WH5511> si-Chon Sihon מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> Me-lech- the king חֶ֠שְׁבּוֹן <WH2809> Chesh-bon of Heshbon וְע֨וֹג <WH5747> ve-'og and Og מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> Me-lech- the king הַבָּשָׁ֧ן <WH1316> hab-ba-Shan of Bashan לִקְרָאתֵ֛נוּ <WH7125> lik-ra-Te-nu against לַמִּלְחָמָ֖ה <WH4421> lam-mil-cha-Mah us unto battle וַנַּכֵּֽם׃ <WH5221> van-nak-Kem. and we smote

וַנִּקַּח֙ <WH3947> van-nik-Kach And we took אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- אַרְצָ֔ם <WH776> 'ar-Tzam, their land וַנִּתְּנָ֣הּ <WH5414> van-nit-te-Nah and gave לְנַחֲלָ֔ה <WH5159> le-na-cha-Lah, it for an inheritance לָרֽאוּבֵנִ֖י <WH7206> lo-r-'u-ve-Ni unto the Reubenites וְלַגָּדִ֑י <WH1425> ve-lag-ga-Di; and to the Gadites וְלַחֲצִ֖י <WH2677> ve-la-cha-Tzi and to the half שֵׁ֥בֶט <WH7626> She-vet tribe הַֽמְנַשִּֽׁי׃ <WH4520> Ham-nash-Shi. of Manasseh

וּשְׁמַרְתֶּ֗ם <WH8104> u-she-mar-Tem, Keep אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- דִּבְרֵי֙ <WH1697> div-Rei therefore the words הַבְּרִ֣ית <WH1285> hab-be-Rit of this covenant הַזֹּ֔את <WH2063> haz-Zot, likewise וַעֲשִׂיתֶ֖ם <WH6213> va-'a-si-Tem and do אֹתָ֑ם <WH853> 'o-Tam; לְמַ֣עַן <WH4616> le-Ma-'an that תַּשְׂכִּ֔ילוּ <WH7919> tas-Ki-lu, them that ye may prosper אֵ֖ת <WH853> 'et כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher you תַּעֲשֽׂוּן׃ <WH6213> ta-'a-Sun. in all that ye do פ Peh

אַתֶּ֨ם <WH859> 'at-Tem You נִצָּבִ֤ים <WH5324> nitz-tza-Vim Ye stand הַיּוֹם֙ <WH3117> hai-yOm this day כֻּלְּכֶ֔ם <WH3605> kul-le-Chem, all לִפְנֵ֖י <WH6440> lif-Nei all of you before יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֑ם <WH430> 'e-lo-hei-Chem; your God רָאשֵׁיכֶ֣ם <WH7218> ra-shei-Chem your captains שִׁבְטֵיכֶ֗ם <WH7626> shiv-tei-Chem, of your tribes זִקְנֵיכֶם֙ <WH2205> zik-nei-Chem your elders וְשֹׁ֣טְרֵיכֶ֔ם <WH7860> ve-Sho-te-rei-Chem, and your officers כֹּ֖ל <WH3605> kol all אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> 'ish [with] all the men יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel

לְמַ֣עַן <WH4616> le-Ma-'an order הָקִֽים־ <WH6965> ha-kim- That he may establish אֹתְךָ֩ <WH853> 'o-te-Cha הַיּ֨וֹם׀ <WH3117> hai-Yom thee to day ל֜וֹ lo לְעָ֗ם <WH5971> le-'Am, for a people וְה֤וּא <WH1931> ve-Hu he יִֽהְיֶה־ <WH1961> yih-yeh- become לְּךָ֙ le-Cha לֵֽאלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> le-lo-Him, unto himself and [that] he may be unto thee a God כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> ka-'a-Sher he דִּבֶּר־ <WH1696> dib-ber- as he hath said לָ֑ךְ Lach; וְכַאֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> ve-cha-'a-Sher to you נִשְׁבַּע֙ <WH7650> nish-Ba' unto thee and as he hath sworn לַאֲבֹתֶ֔יךָ <WH1> la-'a-vo-Tei-cha, unto thy fathers לְאַבְרָהָ֥ם <WH85> le-'av-ra-Ham to Abraham לְיִצְחָ֖ק <WH3327> le-yitz-Chak to Isaac וּֽלְיַעֲקֹֽב׃ <WH3290> u-le-ya-'a-ko. and to Jacob

וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> ve-Lo not אִתְּכֶ֖ם <WH854> 'it-te-Chem for לְבַדְּכֶ֑ם <WH905> le-vad-de-Chem; alone אָנֹכִ֗י <WH595> 'a-no-Chi, I כֹּרֵת֙ <WH3772> ko-Ret Neither with you only do I make אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַבְּרִ֣ית <WH1285> hab-be-Rit this covenant הַזֹּ֔את <WH2063> haz-Zot, likewise וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הָאָלָ֖ה <WH423> ha-'a-Lah and this oath הַזֹּֽאת׃ <WH2063> haz-Zot. likewise

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for אַתֶּ֣ם <WH859> 'at-Tem you יְדַעְתֶּ֔ם <WH3045> ye-da'-Tem, (For ye know אֵ֥ת <WH853> 'et אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- how יָשַׁ֖בְנוּ <WH3427> ya-Shav-nu how we have dwelt בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> be-'E-retz in the land מִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> mitz-Ra-yim; of Egypt וְאֵ֧ת <WH853> ve-'Et אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- and how עָבַ֛רְנוּ <WH5674> 'a-Var-nu and how we came בְּקֶ֥רֶב <WH7130> be-Ke-rev through הַגּוֹיִ֖ם <WH1471> hag-go-Yim the nations אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which עֲבַרְתֶּֽם׃ <WH5674> 'a-var-Tem. which ye passed by
